snippet: A state appeals court refused today to reinstate the murder conviction of the former Black Panther Elmer Pratt.     Mr. Pratt, known as Geronimo, is free on bail after serving 27 years in prison for the 1968 robbery and fatal shooting of a schoolt...
lead_paragraph: A state appeals court refused today to reinstate the murder conviction of the former Black Panther Elmer Pratt. Mr. Pratt, known as Geronimo, is free on bail after serving 27 years in prison for the 1968 robbery and fatal shooting of a schoolteacher, Caroline Olsen, in Santa Monica. He said he was in Oakland when she was killed.
abstract: California appeals court refuses to reinstte murder conviction of Elmer Pratt, former member of Black Panther Party who was freed on bail after serving 27 years for 1968 robbery and fatal shooting of school teacher Caroline Olsen and was granted new trial because of question over credibility of witness who, unknown to jury, was informer (S)
